youtube.title: How Do Braces Work? Orthodontic Mechanics Explained
youtube.description: Ever wondered how brackets and wires move your teeth? This video breaks down the biology and mechanics behind orthodontic treatment. Learn how constant pressure reshapes your jaw and aligns your smile for better dental health and aesthetics.
